summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5813 for the improvement of 6th Avenue South, from Holgate Street to Lander Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76631 as amended by Ordinance No. 76847, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
